import re

def clock_degree(s):
    if not re.match(r'([0-1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):[0-5][0-9]', s):
        return "Check your time !"

    hr, sec = tuple(map(int, s.split(":")))
    hr = str((hr % 12) * 30 if hr % 12 > 0 else 360)
    sec = str(sec * 6 if sec > 0 else 360)
    return hr + ":" + sec
clock_degree=lambda s: (lambda h,m: "%s:%s" %(30*(h%12) or 360,6*m or 360) if 0<=h<=23 and 0<=m<=59 else "Check your time !")(*[int(a) for a in s.split(":")])

def clock_degree(s) :
    hh, mm = list(map(int, s.split(':')))
    if not (0 <= hh < 24 and 0 <= mm < 60):
        return 'Check your time !'
    hh %= 12
    fix_zero = lambda theta: theta if theta != 0 else 360
    return f'{fix_zero(hh * 30)}:{fix_zero(mm * 6)}'
